projects.name: Audiophile Ecom-site
projects.description: A responsive online store frontend built using React, Redux, React Hook Form, and Tailwind CSS. It showcases various audio products, with features like dynamic routing, order form, a shopping cart and a clean, modern interface.

projects.name: Xmas-Cards
projects.description: a web application built with React that allows users to design and customize holiday greeting cards. users can select from pre-designed templates and jokes. It allows users to preview their custom cards in real-time.

projects.name: AI enhanced Kanban Task Management App
projects.description: a project management tool built with React and Redux for state management. It allows users to create, organize, and track tasks through a drag-and-drop interface, mimicking a kanban board. It's a practical tool for organizing work and visualizing progress in a project.

projects.name: Interactive Rating component
projects.description: The Interactive Rating Component is a solution to a Frontend Mentor challenge. Users can select a rating from 1 to 5, submit it, and see a 'Thank You' message with their selected rating. Built with HTML5, CSS (Flexbox, Grid), and JavaScript, it focuses on DOM manipulation to update the UI dynamically.

projects.name: Simple Shell
projects.description: a custom implementation of a Unix shell that supports both interactive and non-interactive modes. It handles basic built-in commands like exit and env, executes simple commands, and resolves commands using the PATH environment variable.

projects.name: Monty Interpreter
projects.description: The Monty Interpreter project is a bytecode interpreter written in C that processes Monty bytecode files (.m). It supports stack and queue operations, allowing manipulation of data through opcodes like push, pall, pint, pop, swap, and arithmetic operations.
